description: This file declares interfaces related to warning reporting control in the WPEFramework, including warning event handling and category management.

classes.name: IWarningEvent
classes.description: Interface for warning event objects, allowing serialization, deserialization, categorization, and warning identification.

classes.name: IWarningReportingUnit
classes.description: Interface for managing warning reporting units, including warning event reporting and category control.

classes.name: IWarningReportingControl
classes.description: Nested interface within IWarningReportingUnit, for controlling warning categories, including exclusion and configuration.

methods.name: ReportWarningEvent
methods.description: Reports a warning event associated with a specific identifier.

methods.name: FetchCategoryInformation
methods.description: Retrieves information about a warning category, including default status, enablement, exclusion list, and configuration.

methods.name: AddToCategoryList
methods.description: Adds a category control to the list of categories.

methods.name: RemoveFromCategoryList
methods.description: Removes a category control from the list of categories.

methods.name: Exclude
methods.description: Excludes a specified category from reporting.

methods.name: Configure
methods.description: Configures a category with specific settings.

methods.name: Clone
methods.description: Creates a clone of the warning reporting control object.
